about_the_game:
Kumoon : VR Expansion Kit 01
SteamVR plugin enabled for the whole game. Oculus and Vive supported.
( Note that you can test a selection of levels with SteamVR support in the main game without purchasing this Dlc. )

Levels like Long Fall, the Spiral Tower and AnsaLattia are specifically built to give the VR player impressive scenes.
Jump over the heart shaped gap in the Psychedelic Fissure level.

Consult our Handy Guidebook!
detailed_description:
Kumoon : VR Expansion Kit 01
SteamVR plugin enabled for the whole game. Oculus and Vive supported.
( Note that you can test a selection of levels with SteamVR support in the main game without purchasing this Dlc. )

Levels like Long Fall, the Spiral Tower and AnsaLattia are specifically built to give the VR player impressive scenes.
Jump over the heart shaped gap in the Psychedelic Fissure level.

Consult our Handy Guidebook!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.10
  • Processor: 2.7GHz dual-core Intel Core i5 or faster
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or better
  • Additional Notes: DK2, Rift Runtime 0.6 support only, no updates expected.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS 10.10
  • Processor: v 2.7GHz dual-core Intel Core i5 or faster
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 470 or better
  • Additional Notes: DK2, Oculus Rift Runtime 0.6 support only, no updates expected.

name: Kumoon : VR Expansion Kit 01

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400 / i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA: GTX 1070 / GTX 970 or greater | AMD: R9 390 / R9 290 or greater
  • Additional Notes: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 1.5 GHz or faster
  • Processor: Intel i5-6400 / i5-4590 equivalent or greater
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA: GTX 1070 / GTX 970 or greater | AMD: R9 390 / R9 290 or greater
  • Additional Notes: SteamVR

short_description: Kumoon : VR Expansion Kit 01 for Oculus Rift DK2, SDK: pre-0.6, PC + Mac
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Finnish, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Greek, Hungarian, Korean, Polish, Romanian, Simplified Chinese, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
